item.title: Installing Hugo: A Quick Start Guide
item.description:
Installing Hugo: A Quick Start Guide

Hugo is a fast and flexible static site generator written in Go. Getting started with Hugo is straightforward, and you can have a site up and running in minutes.

What is Hugo?

Hugo is one of the most popular open-source static site generators. It’s designed for speed and flexibility, making it perfect for blogs, documentation sites, portfolios, and more.

Installation Methods

macOS

Using Homebrew (Recommended):
